solution_line_template: Find how many soaps are in 1 box by multiplying the number of soaps per package by the number of packages per box: {soaps_per_package}*{packages_per_box}=<<{soaps_per_package}*{packages_per_box}={soaps_in_one_box}>>{soaps_in_one_box} soaps.

Then find how many soaps {num_boxes} boxes contain by multiplying the number of boxes by the number of soaps per box: {soaps_in_one_box}*{num_boxes}= <<{soaps_in_one_box}*{num_boxes}={total_soaps}>>{total_soaps} soaps.
